item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-08-18
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Sigh. Having troubles connecting to certain websites. Installed Tor, sites now work. Comcast is screwing up routing somehow. #
  • I'm at peets Newton Center (776 beacon st, Langley, newton center). #

Powered by Twitter Tools.
